item.title: Meet Shubhanshu Shukla, Tibor Kapu, and Slawosz Uznanski-Wisniewski, the first astronauts from India, Hungary, and Poland to visit the International Space Station
item.description: Axiom Space, based in Houston, arranged the chartered flight, which was commanded by America’s most experienced astronaut, Peggy Whitson.

item.title: Fortune 500 companies that have active contracts with ICE
item.description: From AT&T to FedEx, these are the organizations contracting with the Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

item.title: Pennsylvania House passes bill mandating cursive education in schools
item.description: An analog throwback in a digital world.

item.title: Rewarding carbon-conscious consumers isn’t radical—it’s the future of banking
item.description: Smart banks will earn Gen Z loyalty by incorporating ESG signals into how customers are scored, segmented, and rewarded.

item.title: RFK Jr. and his new vaccine committee are obsessing over thimerosal, a preservative antivaxxers have falsely tied to autism despite zero evidence of causation
item.description: Some public health experts contend the thimerosal discussion will unnecessarily raise doubt in vaccines.
